Entity.Description: This table stores all payment types supported by various organizations.
Entity.Name: Payment_Type

Attribute.Description: The primary key for the YFS_PAYMENT_TYPE table.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Type_Key

Attribute.Description: The unique identifier for the payment type.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Type

Attribute.Description: The organization that is associated with this payment type.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: The description of the payment type.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Type_Description

Attribute.Description: This filed indicates the payment type group, which will determine behavior.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Type_Group

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Interface_Time

Attribute.Description: This field is not currently used.
Attribute.Name: Collect_External_Through_Ar

Attribute.Description: The type of the financial organization.
Attribute.Name: Financial_Org_Type

Attribute.Description: The organization code against which financial transactions are recorded.
Attribute.Name: Financial_Org_Code

Attribute.Description: The identifier of the merchant used for the collection.
Attribute.Name: Merchant_Id

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether financial handling is required.
Attribute.Name: Financial_Handling_Required

Attribute.Description: The sequence in which charges needs to be collected if multiple payment types are supported by an organization.
Attribute.Name: Charge_Sequence

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates if the requestCollection API should create a CHARGE request against this Payment Type in all scenarios where an AUTHORIZATION request would be created.
Attribute.Name: Charge_Instead_Of_Auth

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the user exit getFundsAvailable should be invoked to determine the funds available on this payment account.
Attribute.Name: Charge_Up_To_Available

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether charge consolidation is allowed for a payment type.
Attribute.Name: Charge_Consol_Allowed

Attribute.Description: The minimum time to wait for utilizing the opportunity to consolidate charges.
Attribute.Name: Min_Wait_Time_For_Consol

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this payment type is valid for returns.
Attribute.Name: Valid_For_Return

Attribute.Description: The sequence in which charges need to to be refunded if multiple payment types are supported by an organization.
Attribute.Name: Refund_Sequence

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates the usage of a payment type as the default one while processing returned goods.
Attribute.Name: Default_For_Return

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether refunds should be issued to the same account on which the payment was made.
Attribute.Name: Refund_Same_Account

Attribute.Description: The payment type that needs to be used for refunds and is only set if not refunding to the same account. Payment type selection is valid only if it belongs to payment type group STORED_VALUE_CARD or OTHER.
Attribute.Name: New_Refund_Payment_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether this payment type has some alternate refund payment type to use in case the refund amount meets the constraint.
Attribute.Name: Has_Alt_Refund_Constraint

Attribute.Description: The operator to be used in evaluating the refund amount against the Refund Constraint Value.
Attribute.Name: Refund_Constraint_Operator

Attribute.Description: The value that will be used to compare the refund amount against.
Attribute.Name: Refund_Constraint_Value

Attribute.Description: The payment type that needs to be used instead if the refund amount meets the constraint formed by the refund constraint operator and value when a new payment is created for refund purposes. The payment type selection is valid only if it belongs to payment type group STORED_VALUE_CARD or OTHER.
Attribute.Name: Refund_Constraint_Payment_Type

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether a new order needs to be created for the Refund Item ID and UOM when a refund needs to be issued on a new payment account for this payment type.
Attribute.Name: Refund_Requires_Fulfillment

Attribute.Description: The item to be included in a new refund fulfillment order when a refund is issued to this payment type.
Attribute.Name: Refund_Item_Id

Attribute.Description: The unit of measure for the refund item.
Attribute.Name: Refund_Item_Uom

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether payment information is required before processing a payment method that is newly created for refunds.
Attribute.Name: Await_Info_On_New_Refund

Attribute.Description: This field controls when reverse authorization requests will be created for this payment type.
Attribute.Name: Auth_Reversal_Strategy

Attribute.Description: This rule determines whether authorizations larger than the settlement amount are able to be used for settlement for this payment type. If IS_MULTIPLE_REQ_ALLOWED or CHARGE_CONSOL_ALLOWED are Y, this is implicitly Y.
Attribute.Name: Allow_Authorizations_To_Exceed_Settlement_Request

Attribute.Description: Number of hours an authorization is valid before expiring for this payment type. This value is not used internally by the system, but may be referenced for the computation of the AuthorizationExpirationDate when processing payment transactions.
Attribute.Name: Authorization_Expiration_Hours

Attribute.Description: Number of hours an authorization is valid for reversal for this payment type. This value is not used internally by the system and serves as an informational field.
Attribute.Name: Authorization_Reversal_Hours

Attribute.Description: Use Same Authorization Multiple Times. This flag controls whether the same authorization request can be allowed multiple times for this payment type.
Attribute.Name: Use_Same_Authorization_Mutliple_Times

Attribute.Description: This rule determines whether reverse authorization requests support partial reversal for this payment type. If Y, partial reversal is supported. If N, only full reversal is supported.
Attribute.Name: Partial_Reversal_Supported

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether or not the system will attempt a zero authorization when this Payment Type is added on the Order.
Attribute.Name: Zero_Amount_Authorization_Supported

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that when the Payment Type is added on the Order, it is already processed. Examples of this Payment Type are checks/cash. A pre processed Charge Transaction record of type CHARGE is created for this Payment Type.
Attribute.Name: No_Processing_Required

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that the Payment Type allows a void operation.
Attribute.Name: Voidable

Attribute.Description: The maximum amount that can be given back as cash for payment methods associated with this payment type.
Attribute.Name: Cash_Back_Limit

Attribute.Description: This field indicates User Interfaces to use the template required to capture Payment Methods of this Payment Type.
Attribute.Name: Payment_Template_Type

Attribute.Name: Payment_Type

Attribute.Description: This field controls when reverse authorization requests will be created for this payment card type.

Attribute.Description: The minimum time to wait for utilizing the opportunity to consolidate charges for this payment card type.
Attribute.Name: Min_Charge_Consol_Hours

Attribute.Description: Use Same Authorization Multiple Times. This flag controls whether the same authorization request can be allowed multiple times for this payment card type.
Attribute.Name: Use_Same_Authorization_Mutliple_Times

Attribute.Description: This rule determines whether authorizations larger than the settlement amount are able to be used for settlement for this card type. If IS_MULTIPLE_REQ_ALLOWED or CHARGE_CONSOL_ALLOWED are Y, this is implicitly Y.
Attribute.Name: Allow_Authorizations_To_Exceed_Settlement_Request

Attribute.Description: Number of hours an authorization is valid before expiring for this payment card type. This value is not used internally by the system, but may be referenced for the computation of the AuthorizationExpirationDate when processing payment transactions.
Attribute.Name: Authorization_Expiration_Hours

Attribute.Description: Number of hours an authorization is valid for reversal for this payment card type. This value is not used internally by the system and serves as an informational field.
Attribute.Name: Authorization_Reversal_Hours

Attribute.Description: The short description of the payment card type.
Attribute.Name: Short_Description

Attribute.Description: The long description for the payment card type.
Attribute.Name: Long_Description

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the user exit getFundsAvailable should be invoked to determine the funds available on this payment card type.
Attribute.Name: Charge_Up_To_Available

Attribute.Description: This rule determines whether reverse authorization requests support partial reversal for this payment card type. If Y, partial reversal is supported. If N, only full reversal is supported.
Attribute.Name: Partial_Reversal_Supported

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether or not the system will attempt a zero authorization when this Payment Type is added on the Order.
Attribute.Name: Zero_Amount_Authorization_Supported

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that when the Payment Type is added on the Order, it is already processed. Examples of this Payment Type are checks/cash. A pre processed Charge Transaction record of type CHARGE is created for this Payment Type.
Attribute.Name: No_Processing_Required

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates that the Payment Type allows a void operation.
Attribute.Name: Voidable

Attribute.Description: The maximum amount that can be given back as cash for payment methods associated with this payment card type.
Attribute.Name: Cash_Back_Limit

Entity.Description: This table stores categorization of charges in the system. Categorization is stored at a rule set level. Examples would be "Shipping", "Handling", "Personalization", etc.

Attribute.Name: Charge_Category_Key

Attribute.Description: Organization Code.
Attribute.Name: Organization_Code

Attribute.Description: Document type to which a charge category belongs.
Attribute.Name: Document_Type

Attribute.Description: Category. For example, "Shipping" ...
Attribute.Name: Charge_Category

Attribute.Description: Description of charge. Used for display purposes during configuration.
Attribute.Name: Description

Attribute.Description: Indicates if a charge category is a discount category.
Attribute.Name: Is_Discount

Attribute.Description: Indicates if a charge is billable to the customer.
Attribute.Name: Is_Billable

Attribute.Description: Indicates if a charge is included in the profit margin calculation.
Attribute.Name: Consider_For_Profit_Margin

Attribute.Description: Indicates if a charge is refundable during returns.
